channel.title: challenge on Mátyás Budavári
channel.description: Recent content in challenge on Mátyás Budavári

item.title: OITM 2021
item.description: Another year has passed, and the 5th OITM has finished. OITM is an IT championship in Hungary, sponsored by large tech companies.

item.title: Starschema Hackathon 2021
item.description: In Hungary, around the end of the year, we usually have some mandatory transferred workdays, when we have to work on Saturdays instead of the days around holidays. It’s not unusual for companies to let their workers spend their time in a more fun way, that’s what we did with an optional hackathon.

item.title: OITM 2020
item.description: The 4th OITM has finished. OITM is an IT championship in Hungary sponsored by large tech companies.

item.title: Advent Of Code
item.description: It’s the time of the year when many people start to countdown with their advent calendars. For coders, there is a special kind of calendar that keeps us busy and help us prepare for the celebration.

item.title: First MakeoverMonday submission
item.description: I’ve started to learn how to create Visualizations with Tableau for a few weeks now. Today I’ve submitted my solution to the recent MakeoverMonday challenge (2020 #23).
